name: shift-scheduler
description: Full-stack shift scheduling application with queue-based fairness algorithm

scripts.dev:backend: npm run install:backend && cd backend && python3 main.py
scripts.install:backend: pip3 install -r requirements.txt || echo 'Root requirements.txt not found' && cd backend && pip3 install -r requirements.txt
scripts.ensure-deps: npm run check-frontend-deps || npm run install:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.build: npm run ensure-deps && npm run install:backend && cd frontend && npm run build && mkdir -p backend/static && cp -r frontend/dist/* backend/static/
scripts.start:prod: npm run install:backend && concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${PORT:-8000}" "cd frontend && npm run preview" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.start:backend: npm run install:backend && cd backend && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port ${PORT:-8000}
